buildCommand: sh -lc "if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix frontend run build; else npm run build; fi"
installCommand: sh -lc "if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix frontend install --legacy-peer-deps; else npm install --legacy-peer-deps; fi"

headers.value: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version, Authorization
